title: My thoughts on Boards
body:
Even though it reminds me of reddit so much ( for those who have seen me on forums you would know i dislike reddit) but i think since oce forum community is so small and unique this could still work for us.

Lets give this a chance guys! 

O, and its good to be back! I hope to put a great "personal" mark upon these boards

replies.body:
Welcome back!
Love the attitude! Keep it up!

Thanks for the reply! Is there something wrong with the upvote/ downvote button?? It doesnt seem to be "going through" , is it a browser problem?

Or has this been discussed already somewhere else?

Not that I'm aware, can you give me an example of not working?
Perhaps someone upvoted while you downvoted or viceversa?

Ive tried on many posts, ive tried to upvote comments but the upvote counter wont change ( like from 1 to 2)

is it just a bug on my end or is anyone else experiencing this?
We fixed that Molendo. Thank you for the report, we wouldn't have noticed without your report because was a firewall issue only affecting players outside the office.
The old forums are a {{champion:26}} times better than boards.
Nah give it time, ur basing an opinion from only being on boards for not even a whole day.. cmon man
Like all changes, we have to come to accept it. So I will. Like the 1 dollar frozen coke maccas stole from Hungry {{champion:24}}
Damn THat Hungry {{champion:24}}  thing was well thought of.  Nice one
Nah, lols is right. Forums are way better than boards.

> Nah, lols is right. Forums are way better than boards.

Because...?
nice pun :D
Thank you. I've decided with the boards now on Oce I needed to change my image of just being that dirty Necromancer that {{summoner:14}} old flames!
I agree. I am willing to give this a chance. The new crowd will probably die down soon
Same problem for me on Windows 8.1 / Chrome

Welcome back Goldendo! (Hue)
Great to see you with a more positive outlook here, hope that stays for a while!

I personally like the new boards over the old forum style. I dunno why exactly as of yet, but I am liking it.
Either way, nice to see you back, hopefully you learnt from your time away. :)
it will stay. Yes i learnt my lesson
It's great that we can upvote now!

No problem. Why was the firewall blocking players from upvoting?

Also, why was it only a feature such as upvoting/ downvoting only blocked?

*Disclaimer: I know very little of these stuff*

They way I understood it, several components of the boards were under firewall before we launched (when we were testing them internally) so that only Riot offices could access them. When we made them public, the upvote / downvote was left behind so only Rioters could use that feature.

Makes sense?
IM FREEEEEEEEEEEEEEE

No... NOOO! I CAN'T DOWNVOTE THIS!

FIX YOUR SH!T RITO!

YAY, I CAN DOWNVOTE NOW! TAKE THAT TEEMO!

PS: Thank you Riot.
ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ Join the glorious molendolution ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ
Please ban molendo and sart asap

When I first loaded this page and the comments were sorted by "best" instead of "new" it tried to tell me I wasn't above level 5 and as such couldn't post. Forums aren't even gone yet and I already miss them.
Haha, but im gonna love it when forums will be gone and everyone wants it back but most of the people who say that will be the ones who said the forums are "aids"
It's a bit like politics. No matter who you vote for, you're **f**ucked. It's about picking the lesser of two evils.
You're funny.
I love the idea that we can "invade" other server's boards. It will be great for promoting inter-server relations! :D

Already started to!

Seems like NA hates us tho
That's pretty typical of NA though. Seen how they treat Aussie tourists?
{{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}  oh yea , we can use these mofos {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:79}}
{{champion:79}} {{item:3089}}  Tip the deathcap.
m'zhonya
I like dis

> Even though it reminds me of reddit so much ( for those who have seen me on forums you would know i dislike reddit) but i think since oce forum community is so small and unique this could still work for us.
> 
> Lets give this a chance guys! 
> 
> O, and its good to be back! I hope to put a great "personal" mark upon these boards

Reddit is very confusing for me to find things and when I visit a post it isn't set our right, so I don't use Reddit. Boards remind me of Reddit definitely, but I don't have as much confusion which is nice. Anyway,  nice to see somebody keeping an open mind about Boards instead of just outright hating it for no reason.
Yep, people need to understand that, why yes it is nearly a copy of reddit, its got plenty of other cool unique features such as f.e.k

You can just post the link

http://th01.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/i/2013/070/a/d/league_of_legends__eclipse_diana_by_gisalmeida-d5g53ca.jpg

Or you can use the paper clip icon right next to the post button.

riperino gd forumerino

Translation: Too much similarity to reddit for me, and has a terribly unpalatable colour scheme.
Same problem for me on Windows 8.1 / Chrome
having the same problem molendo :C it doesnt want to let me up or down vote D:
Seconded. I am using Chrome as well.
We got a thread to page two though. yay milestones.
All bow down to OP!
MOLENDO HAS RISEN FROM THE GRAVE! {{champion:83}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:6}}
I have always been here, watching from the shadows, {{champion:238}}
Then you saw my eulogy...
i did <3
WELCOME BACK MOLENDO! Can't say I missed you but good to see you're back, at least the community feels more like it should (aside from boards that is).
